item.title: C++ Primer Exercise Answer (Section 2.5.2)
item.description: #include <iostream> using namespace std; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { int i = 0, &r = i; auto a = r; const int ci = i, &cr = ci; auto b = ci; auto c = cr; auto d = &i; auto e = &ci; const auto f = ci; auto &g = ci; //auto &h = 42; const auto &j = 42; a = 42; // ok b = 42; // ok c = 42; // ok d = 42; // no, d is a pointer e = 42; // no, e is a pointer g = 42; // no, g is a reference cannot rebind return 0; }
